markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Vital Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=627) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 201 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Divine Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=611) or [Primal Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=613)

</column>

---

Vital power surges through you like a font of energy. Twice per day, you can cast a spell after you’ve run out of spell slots of the appropriate spell level; the two spells you cast with this feat must be of different spell levels.
name: Greater Vital Evolution

Twice per day, you can cast a spell after you’ve run out of spell slots of the appropriate spell level; the two spells you cast with this feat must be of different spell levels.
